page.title: 16CROPS IN LERRYN
page.content: {Grass}is the major crop grown on all the farms, and it can be cut in {May or June}for{silage}and in{June}or {July}for hay. Other crops grown for animal feed are{mangels, fodder beet and {rape. Cereal crops grown are{wheat, {barley}and{oats. Many farms also grow{potatoes, {cabbages, cauliflowers}and{spring {greens. }Some farmers have{orchards and produce{apples}for their own{cider presses. There are a few{market gardens}in the area, which produce small amounts of{salad vegetables and soft fruits.
